Introduction

The SeeYa (Korean: 더 씨야) was a four-member girl group under Core Contents Media (now known as MBK Entertainment). They debuted on November 12, 2012 with the digital single "Good To Seeya". The group was presented as a new version of SeeYa (another disbanded group from CCM), with a totally new lineup.
